description: This file contains utility functions for the Gemini Tutor project, including message handling, displaying tool calls, and showing grounding metadata within a Streamlit application.

classes.name: Citations
classes.description: Model representing citation URLs and related metadata.

classes.name: ToolExecution
classes.description: Model representing a tool execution call with name and arguments.

methods.name: add_message
methods.description: Adds a message to the Streamlit session state, including optional tool calls and additional attributes.

methods.name: display_tool_calls
methods.description: Displays a list of tool calls in a formatted manner within a Streamlit container.

methods.name: display_grounding_metadata
methods.description: Displays source citations if available, formatted as links, in a Streamlit app.
